p.span: Governor DeWine has called for K-12 schools to close for the remainder of the 2019 - 2020 school year.

span.div: Please click on this link for information and updates:

li.a: Facility Use Request Policy and Fees

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'PDF', 'Download', 'Elementary Parents - How to request a Chromebook 4/02/2020, 8PM');

li.a: Elementary Parents - How to request a Chromebook 4/02/2020, 8PM

span.div:
Dear Families,
Governor DeWine has called for PreK-12 schools to close temporarily. Norwood will be closed beginning Monday, March 16.

div.br: Staff will send schoolwork home with students tomorrow and teachers will follow up with students and parents weekly regarding instruction.
We will provide lunch for pick up beginning Tuesday, March 17 from 11am to 1pm at each of our schools.
Please check our Facebook page and website for the latest news and updates.
